column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The plan was to go for our dinner Sunday night
column2: but alas due to the terrible sunburn/heat exhaustion I was suffering from
column3: we decided to stay in for the rest of the day.  So we ordered delivery!  We got the Malnati Chicago Classic (sausage with buttercrust)
column4: and added in mushrooms and spinach.  The only problem with our plan was our lack of plates
column5: and with deep dish pizza plates are pretty important.  We managed to make our way though
column6: and enjoyed our bounty of cheesy deliciousness.
